hotels.title: Once-in-a-Lifetime All-Inclusive Kimberley Outback River Station
hotels.description: Bullo River Station in the Kimberley is a one-of-a-kind experience that will stay with you long after youâ€™ve left its remote location. Spend your days cruising the Bullo River, looking out for wildlife and admiring the station from above with a helicopter flight. Swim in billabongs, picnic by waterfalls and learn more about the ancient Miriuwung-Gajerrong culture. After adventurous days, laze by the homestead pool or take your pick of hammocks among the palm trees. Unwind in your inviting accommodation, a sanctuary inspired by the surrounding landscape, or make the most of the verdant and shady gardens.
